docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Register Procedure
docs.text:
1. Select Register
  2. Add Email address to Email input box
  3. Add Password to input box and confirm by adding again to the second box
  4. Click Register

docs.title: Possible Issues
docs.text:
• Incorrect email address
  • Passwords not matching
  • Password manager auto populating the boxes
  • Caps lock on
  • Num Lock off

docs.title: Description
docs.text: Login page once registered to access the site.

docs.title: Procedure
docs.text:
1. Add Email Address
  2. Password
  3. Log In
  4. Remember me ? to store a cookie to save re entering details.

docs.title: Possible Issues
docs.text:
• Caps Lock on
  • Wrong Password / Username Register Page
